description: Structured information on the behavioral task that had to be performed by a subject.
label: Behavioral task
name: BehavioralTask

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description of this behavioral task.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this behavioral task.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.name: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this behavioral task.
